casebody.data:
Michael KING, petitioner,
v.
Anthony LUMPKIN, Individually and in His Official Capacity as a Police Officer for the City of Jonesboro, Georgia and as a Resource Officer for Clayton County Public Schools. No. 13-1176. Supreme Court of the United States June 2, 2014. Case below, 545 Fed.Appx. 799 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
